title: Power of sales and the love of skins :D

replies.body: This may not be the current snowdown sale, but i know last years sale i got Firefighter Trist and Annie in Wonderland.
God I just need challenger ahri and alcolyte lee sin.Also I wish they made an arcade zed xD That would be funny,the sidekick of final boss veigar

>
> God I just need challenger ahri and alcolyte lee sin.Also I wish they made an arcade zed xD That would be funny,the sidekick of final boss veigar

Arcade zed would be so good :D but sadly they chosen to do project zed.
